sentences.en: Cold and hungry, they drifted helplessly towards the Arctic.
sentences.cn: 他们又冷又饿, 无助地漂向北极.

sentences.en: Have you been to the Arctic?
He will go up to the Arctic Region.
the Arctic island of Novaya Zemlya
The Arctic Ocean is considered to be a northern part of the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 北冰洋被看做是大西洋的北部.

sentences.en: The Arctic remains the domain of the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 北极仍是北极熊的领地.

sentences.en: The arctic tundra is at the top of the world around the North Pole.
sentences.cn: 北极冻原是指北极点周边的地区,是世界最高的地方.

sentences.en: The explorers spent months in the Arctic wastes.
sentences.cn: 探险家们在北极荒原上工作了几个月.

sentences.en: The Greenpeace flagship is voyaging through the Arctic cold of the Barents Sea.
sentences.cn: 绿色和平组织的旗舰正在穿越巴伦支海的北极寒冷地带。

sentences.en: The sort of animal lived in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.cn: 这种动物生活在北极圈里.
这就是我的北极冒险经历.

sentences.en: They flew over the unlimited reaches of the Arctic.
sentences.cn: 他们飞过了茫茫无边的北极上空.

sentences.en: This ship was designed expressly for exploring the Arctic waters.
sentences.cn: 这艘船是为考察北极水域而特意设计的.

sentences.en: TV pictures showed the arctic conditions.
sentences.cn: 电视画面显示了严寒的环境。

sentences.en: We are not very forward with our preparations for our Arctic expedition next year.
sentences.cn: 我们为明年北极探险所做的准备工作进展不快.

phrases.tran_cn: 北极冻原；北极苔原；藓苔湿原

trans.tran_en: relating to the most northern part of the world
The Arctic is the area of the world around the North Pole. It is extremely cold and there is very little light in winter and very little darkness in summer.
